body.name: Mr. Coffee Iced Coffee Maker, Single Serve Machine with 22-Ounce Tumbler and Reusable Coffee Filter, Burgundy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: REFRESHING ICED COFFEE AT HOME, IN MINUTES! The Mr. Coffee Iced Coffee Maker lets you enjoy delicious, refreshing iced coffee at home or on the go, just the way you like it—brews in under 4 minutes

ICED COFFEE THAT'S NEVER WATERED DOWN: The RapidChill brewing process quickly cools hot, concentrated coffee over a full tumbler of ice, ensuring consistently bold, flavorful iced coffee that's never watered down

BREW AT HOME, SAVE MONEY: By making your own iced coffee at home, you can save up to $800 a year!* *Savings based on consumer spending at least $2.65 a day on purchasing pre-made iced coffee vs. $0.37 a day to make iced coffee at home

EASY TO MAKE, EASY TO CUSTOMIZE: Make refreshing iced coffee at home—just add water and coffee grounds to the machine, ice to the tumbler, and brew; customize with your favorite flavorings and milks, for a perfect, flavorful iced coffee just how you like it
CONSISTENTLY GREAT TASTE: Easy-to-use measuring scoop and tumbler markings for consistently great taste
body.description: The Mr. Coffee Iced Coffee Maker makes it simple to create refreshing iced coffee in minutes at home. The RapidChill brewing process quickly cools hot, concentrated coffee over a full tumbler of ice. This builds maximum flavor for consistently bold and flavorful iced coffee that's never watered down. Just add water and coffee grounds to the machine, fill the tumbler with ice, then press Start. Customize with your favorite flavorings and milks, and sip and enjoy. You'll always have perfect iced coffee to help you conquer the day! The reusable tumbler and scoop help you measure for great tasting iced coffee every time. And by making your own iced coffee, you can save up to $800 a year!* Enjoy at home, or take it to go with the durable BPA-free Tritan tumbler, lid, and straw. It's iced coffee made easy. *Savings based on consumer spending at least $2.65 a day on purchasing pre-made iced coffee vs. $0.37 a day to make iced coffee at home. Just add water and coffee grounds to the machine, fill the tumbler with ice, then press Start. Customize with your favorite flavorings and milks, and sip and enjoy. You'll always have perfect iced coffee to help you conquer the day! The reusable tumbler and scoop help you measure for great tasting iced coffee every time. And by making your own iced coffee, you can save up to $800 a year!* Enjoy at home, or take it to go with the durable BPA-free Tritan tumbler, lid, and straw. It's iced coffee made easy. *Savings based on consumer spending at least $2.65 a day on purchasing pre-made iced coffee vs. $0.37 a day to make iced coffee at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It makes coffee
reviews.reviewText: It’s a single serve ice coffee machine. Simple, yet effective. I haven’t had any issues with it and use it every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes great iced coffee!
reviews.reviewText: Wow, I love this little iced coffee maker! I didn't have high expectations for it but I promise you, it's a awesome machine! I've tried many different coffee makers and none of them made a good iced coffee besides the Ninja coffee bar. However, the Ninja bar malfunctioned constantly and had to keep getting replaced (this shouldn't happen with a almost $200 product) so we eventually threw it away. My husband bought a Keurig coffee maker but to me, the coffee that comes from that tastes like sock water. It's gross and not strong enough for my liking plus it cannot make a good iced coffee.This machine is small so it doesn't take up much counter space at all. It is very easy to use and clean! The cup it comes with is nice and you can measure the amount of water for the machine with it (it has the water line on the cup) so it will make just enough for the cup! Fill it with water, add coffee grounds, add ice and sugar (or fake sugar and syrup if you do that) to your cup, and press start- it's that simple! You can select your desired drip speed, I slide it all the way so that it drips faster, however, it is still kind of a slow drip. I love this coffee maker and for $30 you cannot go wrong! Now I don't have to take trips to our local coffee shop and I'll be saving $4 a cup ☺️.ETA- yes, the coffee comes out hot because you're suppose to add ice to your cup for a "iced coffee" lolol. Don't worry about adding too much ice, fill the cup all the way to the top with ice, by the time the coffee is done you'll have a perfect amount of ice and not too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and convenient
reviews.reviewText: This is a great value for iced coffee lovers. Very convenient to brew a cold coffee at home or workplace whenever you want. The cup takes the guesswork out of brewing a good iced coffee. I have purchased previously and bought this one for a friend. You can customize by adding creamer and syrups. I add a protein shake to the iced coffee I brew and customize with no sugar syrup. I use this 5 days a week and no issues yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars That the coffee tastes amazingly good not water down nor anything!!!
reviews.reviewText: My likings was that the coffee was prefect and strong to the taste! Didn’t like that it melted a few of the ice but that’s ok overall like this item, it does brew kinda slow but again that’s also okay because it makes a prefect ice coffee especially to my likings!!! Great buy great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price and quality
reviews.reviewText: This inexpensive iced coffee maker works well for making a good cup of iced coffee. It’s small, so it fits anywhere. I like strong coffee so I use a scoop and a half to a scoop and 3/4 to make a strong enough coffee for me. Definitely worth the price and convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for Iced Tea
reviews.reviewText: I used to make pitchers of iced tea, but I found that the tea did not age well in the refrigerator. This item allows me to quickly make a large glass of iced tea that tastes fresh. I use bulk loose leaf tea, so the cost per glass is very small. Cleanup is simple - just empty the inner basket in the trash and rinse the residual tea leafs out in the sink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for my everyday coffee. I haven't had any issues with it but I haven't been using it long. It actually works and it's such a low price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't keep ice
reviews.reviewText: Update: After using this quite a few times, I would recommend this product. Yes, most of the ice melts before it's done brewing, but the cup is very insulated for a plastic cup and keeps the drink cold for a long time. I will be keeping it after all. It does a good job for the money.Original: I was a little skeptical, but this got great reviews and Mr. Coffee is a great name so I tried it. Machine is nice enough. Easy instructions and easy to use. However, I love my iced coffee full of ice and freezing cold. I'm not sure what kind of ice other reviewers are using, but I used big ice cubes from my fridge maker and filled the tumbler. By the time the coffee was done brewing over it, ALL the ice was melted. I was a bit saddened by this. I would say the drink is definitely cold, but I'm not sure I like the fact that there's no ice left. Not sure I'll be keeping this.
Muy práctica llego en perfecto estado, y el café sale justo para los hielos, no se siente diluido
Es muy fácil de usar, viene con instructivo para hacer café, 1000/10

reviews.reviewTitle: Too pricey! Oster has the same product half the price
reviews.reviewText: To expensive it I do use it every day.
Does not fill the cup and you have to remove the hot part to add more water...dangerous as well
